content.value:
I pretty much bombed the in person coding challenge for my first ever programming interview

I couldn’t stop thinking about it after, so I ended up rewriting the coding challenge from memory and emailing it to the hiring team with a note saying “I can do better!”

I got the job!
content.html: I pretty much bombed the in person coding challenge for my first ever programming interview I couldn’t stop thinking about it after, so I ended up rewriting the coding challenge from memory and emailing it to the hiring team with a note saying “I can do better!” I got the job!
